bioAsHtml: I'm the person who's wrong on the Internet. I also lead the lead the development of Lightbend Fast Data Platform, a curated distribution of open-source streaming data engines, Spark, Flink, Akka Streams, and Kafka, with management tools, etc. I wrote the second edition of O'Reilly's "Programming Scala", as well as other books. I help organize several conferences and user groups in Chicago, USA.
